en.title: AI Translator
en.description: Translate text between languages using AI

seo.whatIsContent: **AI Translation** uses **Chrome's local AI** (Translator API + Language Detector) or **Google Gemini** to translate text between languages with high accuracy. Supports 100+ languages with automatic language detection.
howToSteps: Paste or type your **text** in the source area
Click **'Detect language'** or select source language

faq.question: Is AI translation free?
faq.answer: Yes! It uses **Chrome's local Translator API** (free, offline) when available, or falls back to **Google Gemini** (requires free API key).

faq.question: How many languages are supported?
faq.answer: Supports **100+ languages** including English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese, Japanese, Arabic, and many more.

faq.question: Is it better than Google Translate?
faq.answer: It uses similar AI technology but processes **locally in your browser** when possible, ensuring privacy and offline capability.
